titles.title: A resolution recognizing a century of broadcasting excellence from WOWO and celebrating the radio station's 100th anniversary.
A resolution recognizing a century of broadcasting excellence from WOWO and celebrating the radio station's 100th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution celebrates March 31, 2025, as the 100th anniversary of the Fort Wayne, Indiana radio station WOWO.
